title: New Year: Reflect & Reframe
description: A deep solo journey. Acknowledge the struggle of the past year, but flip the card to find the strength and gratitude within it.

cards.content: What was the hardest truth I had to accept this year?
cards.back: What freedom did accepting it give me?

cards.content: What version of myself am I leaving behind?
cards.back: What new version am I welcoming?

cards.content: What was my biggest 'failure' this year?
cards.back: What crucial lesson did it teach me?

cards.content: Who drained my energy the most?
cards.back: Who energized me the most?

cards.content: What is a boundary I failed to hold?
cards.back: How will I protect my peace next year?

cards.content: What is a goal I gave up on?
cards.back: What is a goal I unexpectedly achieved?

cards.content: What is a pain I am still carrying?
cards.back: What is a joy I am still feeling?

cards.content: When did I feel the most lonely?
cards.back: When did I feel the most loved?

cards.content: What part of my life felt like a lie?
cards.back: What felt undeniably real and true?

cards.content: What am I pretending not to know?
cards.back: What truth am I finally ready to live?

cards.content: What risk did I avoid out of fear?
cards.back: What bravery did I show elsewhere?

cards.content: Who did I disappoint this year?
cards.back: Who did I make proud?

cards.content: What is a bad habit I picked up?
cards.back: What is a good habit I maintained?

cards.content: When was I too hard on myself?
cards.back: Say one kind thing to yourself right now.

cards.content: What is something I lost this year?
cards.back: What is something I found?

cards.content: Did I work to live or live to work?
cards.back: What was my best moment of rest?

cards.content: What relationship faded away?
cards.back: What new connection blossomed?

cards.content: What made me cry the most?
cards.back: What made me laugh the hardest?

cards.content: What was my biggest waste of money?
cards.back: What was my best investment (in myself)?

cards.content: What fear held me back?
cards.back: What hope drove me forward?

cards.content: What is a grudge I'm holding onto?
cards.back: Imagine how light you'll feel letting it go.

cards.content: When did I betray my own needs?
cards.back: When did I stand up for myself?

cards.content: What compliment did I deflect?
cards.back: Accept it now. Describe it.

cards.content: What feels unfinished?
cards.back: What feels beautifully complete?

cards.content: How did I neglect my body?
cards.back: How did my body serve and protect me?

cards.content: What is the biggest lie I told myself?
cards.back: What is the most empowering truth?

cards.content: What kept me up at night with worry?
cards.back: What dream kept me excited?

cards.content: Where did I settle for less?
cards.back: Where did I demand what I deserve?

cards.content: What do I need to forgive myself for?
cards.back: What do I need to thank myself for?

cards.content: If this year had a sad song, what is it?
cards.back: What is the anthem for next year?

cards.content: What is a 'No' I regret saying?
cards.back: What is a 'Yes' that changed everything?

cards.content: What made me feel small?
cards.back: What made me feel powerful?

cards.content: What clutter (mental or physical) am I keeping?
cards.back: What space am I clearing for new things?

cards.content: Who brought out the worst in me?
cards.back: Who brought out the best in me?

cards.content: What am I afraid of leaving behind?
cards.back: What am I excited to walk towards?

cards.content: When did I feel invisible?
cards.back: When did I feel truly seen?

cards.content: What was an awkward mistake I made?
cards.back: How did I grow from it?

cards.content: What is something I took for granted?
cards.back: Express gratitude for it now.

cards.content: What is a story I need to stop telling myself?
cards.back: What is the new story for next year?

cards.content: Did I isolate myself?
cards.back: How will I connect more next year?

cards.content: What is the hardest goodbye I said?
cards.back: What was the sweetest hello?

cards.content: Am I happy with how I spent my time?
cards.back: What was my favorite way I spent time?

cards.content: What triggered my anxiety?
cards.back: What brought me peace?

cards.content: Did I prioritize others over myself?
cards.back: How will I prioritize me next year?

cards.content: What is a criticism that stuck with me?
cards.back: Counter it with a affirmation.

cards.content: Was I a good friend?
cards.back: Who was a good friend to me?

cards.content: What makes me feel heavy right now?
cards.back: Take a deep breath. Release it.

cards.content: What is my biggest regret?
cards.back: How can I fix it or accept it?

cards.content: Am I running away from something?
cards.back: What am I running towards?

cards.content: Who am I?
cards.back: Who do I want to be?

cards.content: What is the word for this past year?
cards.back: What is the word for the new year?

cards.content: Are you ready to let go?
cards.back: Say 'I am ready'.
